      Description copied from interface: Resettable

      Specified by:

      Returns:
      the existence of the instance in the game. for example, true to keep it permanent, or false if instance needs to be removed from the reset list.

    • subtractSouls

      public boolean subtractSouls​(int souls)
      Description copied from interface: Soul
      Allow other classes to deduct the number of this instance's souls By default, an instance cannot get its own souls subtracted. You may override this method to conduct subtraction on current souls.
      Specified by:
      subtractSouls in interface Soul
      Parameters:
      souls - number souls to be deducted
      Returns:
      transaction status. True if subtraction successful, otherwise False.

    • addSouls

      public boolean addSouls​(int souls)
      Description copied from interface: Soul
      Increase souls to current instance's souls. By default, it cannot increase the souls. You may override this method to implement its functionality.
      Specified by:
      addSouls in interface Soul
      Parameters:
      souls - number of souls to be incremented.
      Returns:
      transaction status. True if addition successful, otherwise False.
